page.title: 04Wootton Flower Show
page.content: This event first began in September 1877 and is probably the oldest organisation in the village. No shows were held during the six years of the two world wars,and after the last war shows did not open until 1949. The show is always held on the nearest Saturday to September 8. The show,which is a popular old-time annual event,is always held in the grounds of the old rectory which is now owned by Mrs Clutterbuck. Cups for special events were first presented after the second world war. Today it is an occasion which all villagers old and young alike attend.There are alot of interesting categories for children to enter.
